Pravda - the pedagogical prover of ENS Rennes - exercices in proof systems

This tool has been created thanks to COVID-19.

Resolution in propositional logic

Resolution rule: special case modus ponens

not p or q * p * //q

A small refutation proof

not p or not q or r * not r * not p or q * p * //not p or not q //not p //bottom

Resolution in first-order logic

Small applications of resolution rules

P(x) * not P(x) or Q(x) * //Q(x)
